Subject: Clean Data, Clear Insights, Inform. Connect. Engage | One Chalhoub, Weekly Internal Opportunities
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

Clean Data, Clear Insights

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1793&user=10620> 	

We’re updating how dashboards and reports are managed in Looker to improve data quality and reduce confusion.

In the coming months, you may get an email about unused content—untouched for over a year—scheduled for deletion.

Don’t worry, you can cancel by clicking the link in the email.

For questions or help, contact tech&data@chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1794&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-4-min.png> 	

Inform. Connect. Engage.




Amplify our story, spotlight your colleagues, and showcase the innovation and impact across the Group — one authentic share at a time.

You can also refer your network directly through our Internal Referral Platform <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1797&user=10620>  – let’s grow our Group together!
